text: @realDonaldTrump "Great reviews"???? There is something seriously wrong with you.  68 thousand deaths, that's not GREAT.  You're a nasty know nothing con who has no LEADERSHIP skills and unable to form a PLAN.  Inept #DonTheCon #COVID19 #ForeverImpeached
